bibl.title: Petitions to the Centurion: A Question of Locality? Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.note: A review of petitions sent to centurions and other military personal rather than to the strategus shows that the great majority of them come from the Fayum. - Pp. 161-169: Table of petitions to centurions, decurions and beneficiarii.
bibl.seg: WHITEHORNE John, Petitions to the Centurion: A Question of Locality? Avec résumé en anglais.

A review of petitions sent to centurions and other military personal rather than to the strategus shows that the great majority of them come from the Fayum. - Pp. 161-169: Table of petitions to centurions, decurions and beneficiarii.
